title: Stream: Alt-J (∆) – An Awesome Wave
body:
One of the most hotly anticipated debut albums of 2012, **Alt-J’s _An Awesome Wave_** has already begun to receive rave reviews and is now available to stream below.

Featuring previous singles _Fitzpleasure_, _Matilda_ and _Breezeblocks_, it’s a hugely invigorating and engaging listen. Check out _**An Awesome Wave**_ in full below which is released 28 May and pre-order it via [Alt-J’s website](http://altjband.com/), Via [NME.com](http://www.nme.com/news/alt-j/63906)
